title: EllipticのAMLソリューション、本邦初の金融庁承認済み円建てステーブルコイン「JPYC」の実現を支援
contentSnippet: ～JPYC・Ellipticの協業により高水準のステーブルコインAML体制を構築～EllipticJapan株式会社／JPYC株式会社暗号資産のマネーロンダリング対策ソリューション（以下「AML」）を提供する業界大手のEllipticEnt...

title: Saudi Arabia's First Quantum Computer: Can It Break Bitcoin?
contentSnippet: Saudi Arabia has deployed its first quantum computer, renewing questions about the future of blockchain security.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: MegaETH scraps $1B plan after technical failures derail sale
contentSnippet: Multiple technical failures during MegaETH’s pre-deposit phase pushed the raise beyond its limit and forced the team to halt the sale.

title: Monad Rises After Airdrop While Bitcoin and Ethereum Droop
contentSnippet: The price of Monad’s native cryptocurrency rose on Tuesday, following an anticipated airdrop that initially underwhelmed some speculators.

title: Bitwise Dogecoin ETF Debut Imminent After Quiet Start for Grayscale DOGE Fund
contentSnippet: Bitwise's Dogecoin ETF, BWOW, was certified by NYSE Arca, signaling investors will soon be able to start trading the meme coin fund.

title: Bitcoin wavers under $88K as traders brace for $14B BTC options expiry
contentSnippet: Bitcoin price stalled as traders consider the impact of Friday’s $14 billion options expiry, but data does show some bullish traders positioning for higher prices.

title: Acting CFTC chair seeks CEOs for ‘innovation council,’ citing crypto
contentSnippet: The US CFTC opened nominations for a CEO-led advisory group that will help shape policy on crypto, prediction markets and other emerging products.

title: Texas Buys $5M in BTC ETF as States Edge Toward First Government Crypto Reserves
contentSnippet: The effort is starting small, but Texas made an opening foray into a state-based crypto reserve — getting closer to the first government stockpile in the U.S.

title: US Bank Is Testing a Stablecoin on Stellar Network
contentSnippet: U.S. Bank joins the growing list of traditional banking institutions working on stablecoins, testing its own on the Stellar blockchain.

title: MoonPay Granted New York Trust Charter, Joining Coinbase and Ripple
contentSnippet: Crypto payments firm MoonPay has gained regulatory approval in New York to safeguard customers’ digital assets and facilitate OTC trades.

title: Kraken Launches Bitcoin Rewards Debit Mastercard Ahead of Planned IPO
contentSnippet: Kraken unveiled a Bitcoin rewards Mastercard debit card that links to its peer-to-peer payments app, Krak.

title: South Africa’s central bank flags crypto, stablecoins as financial risk
contentSnippet: The bank cited increasing trading volume and the number of users among large exchanges, as well as gaps in South Africa’s regulatory framework on crypto.

title: How Zcash went from low-profile token to the most-searched asset in November 2025
contentSnippet: Halving math, shielded growth and NU6.1 governance turned Zcash from a low-profile relic into November’s most-searched crypto.

title: Paxos acquires Fordefi to power stablecoin, tokenization infrastructure
contentSnippet: The addition of Fordefi’s MPC wallet infrastructure broadens Paxos’ regulated capabilities for custody, tokenization and institutional onchain operations.

title: Polymarket Set for US Return Following Approval From CFTC
contentSnippet: The popular prediction market says it now has permission to directly onboard U.S. customers, brokerages, and market intermediaries.

title: Stellar Rallies 2.3% Breaking Key Resistance on Volume Surge
contentSnippet: Stellar breaks through critical $0.2460 level as institutional flows drive measured accumulation above seven-day averages.

title: Metaplanet Reveals Yet Another Move to Add to $2.7 Billion Bitcoin Stash, Taking $130M Loan
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury Metaplanet has announced a new plan to buy more BTC: Use its holdings as collateral to take a $130 million loan.

title: Polymarket wins regulatory approval to operate US trading platform
contentSnippet: The approval came as the US Senate is expected to soon vote on prospective CFTC Chair Michael Selig as a replacement for acting chair Caroline Pham.

title: U.S. Crypto Regulator, CFTC, Seeking Names for New 'CEO Innovation Council'
contentSnippet: Acting Chairman Caroline Pham said the group will help usher in a new era of market structure, including a focus on digital assets.

title: Bitcoin short-squeeze to $90K possible as funding rates turn negative
contentSnippet: Negative Bitcoin funding rates and large short liquidity zones could be a sign that a short-squeeze to $90,000 and higher could be on the cards.

title: Filecoin Spikes 9% as Downtrend Breaks
contentSnippet: The strong price action occurred on below-average volume.

title: U.S Bank Tests Custom Stablecoin Issuance on Stellar Network
contentSnippet: The nation's fifth-largest commercial bank explores how a bank can issue stablecoins on a public blockchain.

title: Is the Bull Market over? The AI Manhattan Project! Monad Launch Reaction!
contentSnippet: Crypto majors rallied alongside a broad market surge, with BTC up 2% to $87,400, ETH up 4% to $2,920, BNB up 1% to $850, and SOL up 5% to $136, while KAS (+22%), ENA (+13%), and SUI (+11%) led the day

title: TON Pulls Back After Ecosystem-Driven Rally as Traders Eye Key Support Near $1.50
contentSnippet: The token's price action points to fading buyer interest, with initial strong trading activity giving way to a sharp decline in participation.

title: Why the SEC’s new guidelines could speed up the approval process for new crypto ETFs
contentSnippet: New SEC rules could reshape the crypto ETF landscape by speeding up approvals, reducing the shutdown backlog and giving issuers a clearer and faster path to market.

title: Oct. 7 Hamas Attack Victims Sue Binance for Damages
contentSnippet: Binance allegedly facilitated the transfer of over $1 billion to sanctioned entities including Hamas and Iran's Revolutionary Guard Corps, a lawsuit said.

title: Anthropic Completes AI Model Upgrades With Claude Opus 4.5—And Slashes Prices
contentSnippet: Anthropic released Claude Opus 4.5, completing its three-model lineup upgrade with benchmark-topping coding performance and a dramatic 67% price cut.

title: ICP Clears Key Technical Barrier as Breakout Volume Confirms Upward Momentum
contentSnippet: Internet Computer climbed through the crucial $4.20 resistance level on elevated volume before late-session consolidation narrowed gains.

title: BONK Breaks Through Overhead Resistance as Volume Jumps 85% Above Average
contentSnippet: Increased trading volume carried BONK through a major resistance threshold before late pullbacks shaped a new support band.

title: Why Bitcoin Is Underperforming Equities Despite Bullish Catalysts
contentSnippet: Gains in AI-fueled stocks and heavy crypto leverage have widened the gap between bitcoin and equities.

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜金融庁の暗号資産規制方針やビットコイン採掘割合の95%到達に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、金融庁の仮想通貨規制方針、ビットコイン採掘割合の95%到達、ビットコインとイーサリアムの市況分析に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: CAICAテクノロジーズ、JPYC決済ソリューションの提供を開始
contentSnippet: CAICAテクノロジーズが日本円ステーブルコインJPYCの決済ソリューション提供を開始。企業向けにコンサルティングサービスと決済モジュールを提供し、ステーブルコイン決済の導入を支援する。

title: ナッジ、ステーブルコイン決済・還元対応クレカ「HashPortカード」発行開始
contentSnippet: HashPortとナッジが日本初となる後払い型クリプトクレジットカード「HashPortカード」を発行開始。ステーブルコインJPYCで決済・還元が可能で、利用額の0.3%をJPYCで還元。年会費無料、カード発行手数料2,500円。

title: Secured Finance CEOが語るJPYC固定金利レンディングの挑戦｜独占インタビュー
contentSnippet: Secured Finance菊池氏が語るJPYC固定金利レンディングの全貌。日本円を世界の金利ベンチマークにする構想、RWA担保展開、x402対応など最新戦略を独占取材。

title: HashPort Wallet、1inchのスワップ技術を統合
contentSnippet: HashPort Walletが1inchのスワップ技術を統合。ブリッジ不要でクロスチェーンスワップが可能に。JPYCを含む暗号資産を複数のブロックチェーン間で効率的に取引できる環境が整った。

title: サークルが「xリザーブ」発表、USDC担保型ステーブルコインを展開可能に
contentSnippet: サークルがブロックチェーン間でUSDC担保型ステーブルコインを展開可能にする相互運用インフラ「xリザーブ」を発表した。

title: GMOトラスト、Japan Smart Chainと提携し日本法準拠ステーブルコイン発行を検討
contentSnippet: GMOトラストがJapanSmartChainと提携AltXリサーチは18日、日本向けレイヤー1ブロックチェーン「JapanSmartChain（JSC）」において、GMOインターネットグループの米国法人GMO-Z.comトラスト・カンパニ...

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜米史上最長の政府閉鎖終了や金持ち父さん著者のBTC・金・銀の価格予想に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は『金持ち父さん貧乏父さん』著者ロバート・キヨサキ氏によるビットコイン・金・銀の価格予想、堀田丸正のBitcoin Japanへの社名変更、米政府の閉鎖終了に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: テクノロジー大手アリババが預金トークン決済を開発　中国当局のステーブルコイン懸念に対処か
contentSnippet: 中国アリババが預金トークン決済システムを開発している。当局によるステーブルコイン規制を回避することも背景とみられる。AI活用サービスも発表した。
